examples: The medicine cabinet in the bathroom holds our first aid supplies.
They want the cabinet all singing from the same hymn sheet.
We installed a corner cabinet in the dining room to maximize space.
The shoe cabinet by the entrance keeps our shoes organized and tidy.
The cabinet doors are made of glass, allowing us to see inside.
words.defineEn: a piece of furniture with shelves or drawers for storing or displaying things

examples: They call me Hutch.
Sort of the first cop show, before Miami Vice, it was like Starsky and Hutch.
They don't call me Coach Hutch, they just call me Hutch I'm Meredith.
We’ve locked Hazel out of his hutch so he doesn’t hurt himself trying to move too much.

I was very excited when I heard you guys were making this movie because Starsky and Hutch when I was in, I'm trying to think when it was, but I think it was when I was in the fifth, sixth or seventh grade, something like that, it was huge, it was a really cool show, loved it, and Yeah, they were the coolest guys on TV.

examples: Um, the only furniture I really have in here is my armoire.

examples: She found a closed drawer and had to find an alternative place to store her belongings.

If he catches you going through his drawers there'll be the devil to pay!

examples: Its hinges are on this side.

- They really do hinges well, don't they?
Add them to your Hinge profile.

examples: He's still playing his cards close to his chest.

They're very picky dressers.
Be a much better dresser than I was in my twenties.

examples: Put your clothes in the cupboard.

Sheila suspected her boyfriend of having cupboard love as he showered her with gifts and attention whenever he needed a favor.

My climbing boots were sitting unused in a cupboard.
